rows.label: qst000803_msg0002
rows.name:
But the treasure I inherited
from my grandpa... I'll
protect it with my life...

rows.label: qst000803_msg0003
rows.name:
What?! You just picked up a
knife with my name on it?

rows.label: qst000803_msg0004
rows.name:
No, I should be the one to
apologize. I'm sorry for
jumping to conclusions.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0005
rows.name:
Traveling alone gets lonely... I
end up telling people my life
story, and about the treasure.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0006
rows.name:
When I do that, sometimes
people attack me, trying
to steal the treasure...

rows.label: qst000803_msg0007
rows.name: Thanks. But you don't need to worry.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0008
rows.name:
My grandpa used to say... treasure
hunters and tightrope walkers are
always next-door neighbors with danger.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0009
rows.name: Oh, right, you brought me the knife.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0010
rows.name:
My grandpa gave this to me,
but it broke when I tried to
pry open the second chest.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0011
rows.name:
A knife with "May fortune be
with you" written on it
breaking... it's a bad omen...

rows.label: qst000803_msg0012
rows.name:
So I gave up on the treasure
and said goodbye to the knife.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0013
rows.name:
But now the knife has returned
to me, along with a mysterious
group of Drivers.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0014
rows.name:
Maybe this is the
guidance of the divine.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0015
rows.name:
And you beat me soundly...
If you were just average, my
grandpa would be furious.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0016
rows.name:
Well, I should be heading
to my next destination.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0017
rows.name:
The treasure of the ancient
Nopon... I'm going to find it!

rows.label: qst000803_msg0018
rows.name:
Don't you dare find it
before me! See ya!
